Job Description:
Are you a passionate and creative individual with a knack for transforming ideas into captivating digital experiences? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! We are seeking a talented Creative Web Designer to join our team at NEXA. As a Creative Web Designer, you will play a pivotal role in crafting visually stunning and user-centric websites that leave a lasting impression on our clients and their audiences.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate closely with clients and internal stakeholders to understand their brand identity, target audience, and project objectives.
Utilize your creativity to conceptualize innovative design solutions that elevate the client’s brand and effectively communicate their message.
Translate design concepts into wireframes, mockups, and prototypes using tools such as Figma, ensuring seamless user experiences and intuitive navigation.
Design visually compelling website layouts, graphics, and animations that captivate users and convey the client’s brand story.
Implement best practices in user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design to create intuitive and engaging interactions.
Leverage your knowledge of design principles, typography, and color theory to create cohesive and aesthetically pleasing designs.
Develop responsive designs using frameworks like Bootstrap, ensuring consistent experiences across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Enhance design functionality and aesthetics by integrating icon libraries like Font Awesome and other visual elements.
Collaborate closely with developers to ensure the successful implementation of design elements while maintaining design integrity and fidelity.
Stay abreast of design trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices to continuously enhance your design skills and knowledge.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Web Design, or a related field.
Proven experience (5 years) working as a web designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing your creative design work and UI/UX projects.
Proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD), or Sketch.
Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and methodologies, with a focus on creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
Experience with responsive design frameworks like Bootstrap to create visually appealing and functional designs across devices.
Familiarity with icon libraries like Font Awesome to enhance design aesthetics and usability.
Creative flair and attention to detail, with a passion for pushing the boundaries of design to deliver innovative solutions.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to articulate design concepts and rationale effectively to clients and team members.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced agency environment.
A collaborative mindset and eagerness to contribute ideas and insights to cross-functional teams.
Joining our team as a Creative Web Designer offers you the opportunity to unleash your creativity, collaborate with talented professionals, and make a meaningful impact through your design expertise. If you are ready to take your design career to the next level and embark on an exciting journey with us, we encourage you to apply and be part of our dynamic team.
Job Type: Contract
Contract length: 12 months
Application Question(s):
Are you willing to do a full-time remote role from 9am - 6pm (GST)?
Do you have a work portfolio? CVs without portfolio will not be contacted.
Are you available to join immediately?
Application Deadline: 15/04/2024
Expected Start Date: 15/04/2024
